GSD.description:
nbd: fix race between nbd_alloc_config() and module removal

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit 165cf2e0019fa6cedc75b456490c41494c34abb4. For more details please see the references link.
